filters.name: tasks-due-today
filters.value: fq=due_tdt:[NOW/DAY TO NOW/DAY%2B1DAY] AND -status_s:COMPLETE AND -status_s:DELETE AND -status_s:CLOSED

filters.name: my-tasks-due-today
filters.value: fq=due_tdt:[NOW/DAY TO NOW/DAY%2B1DAY] AND -status_s:COMPLETE AND -status_s:DELETE AND -status_s:CLOSED AND assignee_s:${user}

filters.name: tasks-overdue
filters.value: fq=due_tdt:[* TO NOW/DAY] AND -status_s:COMPLETE AND -status_s:DELETE AND -status_s:CLOSED

filters.name: my-tasks-overdue
filters.value: fq=due_tdt:[* TO NOW/DAY] AND -status_s:COMPLETE AND -status_s:DELETE AND -status_s:CLOSED AND assignee_s:${user}
